original_text: Day 15 is the start of a week when you must eat the flat bread. You must not put any yeast in the bread. You must do that for seven days.
korean_text: 또 그 달 열다섯째 날부터는 명절이니 이레 동안 무교병을 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Day 15 is the start of a week
when you must eat the flat bread
You must not put any yeast in the bread
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 빵에 누룩을 넣지 말아야 합니다

sentences.original_text: You must do that for seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그것을 칠 일 동안 해야 합니다
